name: Silken Tofu with Soy Sauce and Chili Oil
description: Silken tofu drizzled with good quality soy sauce, chili oil, and sesame oil.  To garnish, minced pickles, scallions and cilantro.
recipeYield: 4 as an appetizer, or 2 as a main course in a light meal
recipeIngredient: 4 teaspoons soy sauce, or to taste
2 teaspoons chili oil, or to taste
1 teaspoon sesame oil, or to taste
About 3 tablespoons minced zha cai (see note)
Chopped scallions and cilantro to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to boil. Gently add the block of silken tofu to the water and simmer until the tofu is warmed through, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain the tofu.

Scooping up rough slabs of the block with a spoon, divide the tofu evenly between 2 bowls, or among 4 if you are serving as an appetizer. Drizzle each portion of tofu with 1 teaspoon soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon chili oil, and 1/4 teaspoon sesame oil. Top with minced zha cai, scallions, and cilantro. Serve immediately.
